name: JetBrains Astra DB Plugin
description: A Jetbrains plugin that allows you to connect and explore your data on Astra DB or any Apache Cassandra cluster running with Stargate.
readme:
JetBrains Astra DB Plugin

15 minutes, Beginner, Get Started

A Jetbrains plugin that allows you to connect and explore your data on Astra DB or any Apache Cassandra cluster running with Stargate.

View the plugin's information page at JetBrains: https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/17013-datastax-astra-db-explorer/

View the plugin's source code on GitHub: https://github.com/datastax/astra-ide-plugin

Quick Start

  • Signup for DataStax Astra, or login to your already existing account.
  • Create an Astra DB Database if you don't already have one.
  • Install the Plugin Follow the installation instructions at the plugin GitHub repository.
